--- select_singer_with_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  Singers B
  ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op: "LEFT OUTER JOIN",
        Left: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As: -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 26,
              NameEnd: 27,
              Name: "A",
            },
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 48,
            NameEnd: 55,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As: -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 56,
              NameEnd: 57,
              Name: "B",
            },
          },
        },
        Cond: &ast.On{
          On: 60,
          Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
            Op: "=",
            Left: &ast.Path{
              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 63,
                  NameEnd: 64,
                  Name: "A",
                },
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 65,
                  NameEnd: 73,
                  Name: "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
            Right: &ast.Path{
              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 76,
                  NameEnd: 77,
                  Name: "B",
                },
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 78,
                  NameEnd: 86,
                  Name: "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers A LEFT OUTER JOIN Singers B ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID
